title: Unable to Log In - URGENT
body:
Not sure if this is a problem with my computer or riot's but ever since 1 game with the new client i havent been able to log in to my account because a message comes up saying that "there is a problem with my connection. If im not currently connected to the internet please do so..." problem is i am connected. Then it provides me with two choices; to restart the client or to shut it down, either way the result is the same and the message keeps appearing so i cant log in. 

If anyone knows whats going on please help - school just ended for me and i wanted to play for a couple of days till i went overseas :(

replies.body:
i followed your advice but now there is a new problem where the moment i double click on league a message pops up saying "rads error please check logs for more info." 
ive tried using a public dns, reinstalling league and reseting wifi 

side note - im unable to switch to a wired connection
